tat a sa tau ahuya vyajahara yuvam mama pasca at  agacchat am yuvam ahar  manuja dharinau karisyami
tena eva tau jalam viha aya tasya pasca at  agacchat am
anantaram tasmai t  sthanat  vrajan vrajan sivat iyasya sutau yakub yohannamanau dvau sahajau tatena sarddham naukopari jalasya jirnoddharam kurvu antau viksya tau ahutavan
tat ksanat  tau na avam svata tanca viha aya tasya pasca at gaminau babhuvatuh
anantaram bhajana bhavane samupadisan rajyasya susamvadam praca arayat  manujanam sarvu aprakaran rogan sarvu aprakara pidah ca samayat  yisuh krtsnam galildesam bhramitum arabhata
tena krtsna suh iyat esasya madhi am tasya yaso vyapnot aparam bhut a grasta apasmai rarginah paksadhatiprabhrtayah ca yavat to manuja nanavidha vyadhibhih klista asan tesu sarvvesu tasya samipam anitesu sa tan svasthan cakara
etena galildikapaniyirusalamyihudiyat esebhi o yarddanah paranca bahavo manujah tasya pasca at  agacchan
anantaram sa jananivahar  niriksya bhudharopari vrajitva samupavivesa
tat anim sisyesu tasya samipam agatesu tena tebhi ah  esa katha a kathyancakre
abhimana hina jana dhanyah yat aste svargiya rajyam adhik arisyat ti
khidyamana manuja dhanyah yasmai t  te santvanam prapsanti
namra manavah ca dhanyah yasmai t  te medinim adhik arisyat ti
dharmmaya bubhuksitah trsarttah ca manuja dhanyah yasmai t  te paritarpsyat ti
krpalavo manava dhanyah yasmai t  te krpam prapsyat ti
nirmmala hrdaya manujah ca dhanyah yasmai t  ta ih caram draksyat ti
melayita aro manava dhanyah yasmai t  ta ih carasya santana tvena vikhyasyat ti
dharmma karanat  tadita manuja dhanya yasmai t  svargiya rajye tesam adhik aro vidyat e
yat a manuja mama na amakrte yusman nindanti tadayat ti mrsa nanadurvvac yani vadanti ca tat a yuyam dhanyah
tat a anandata tat ha bhrsam hladadhvanca yat ah svarge bhuyamsi phalani lapsyat hve te yusmakam purat at an bhavisyat vadinopi tadrg atadayat
yuyam medinyam lavana rupah kintu yat i lavanasya lavana tvam apayati tarhi tat  kena prakarena svadu yuktam bhavisyat i tat  kasyah pi karyyasyah h yogyat vat kevalam bahis  prakseptum naranam pada talena dalayitunca yogyam bhavat i
yuyam jagat i dipti rupah bhudharopari sthitam nagaram guptam bhavitum na hi saksyat i
aparam manujah pradipan prajvalya drona adho na sthapayat ti kintu dipa adharo paryyeva sthapayat ti tena te dipa geha sthitan sakalan prakasayat  ti
yena manava yusmakam sat karmmani vilokya yusmakam svarga stham pitaram dhanyam vadanti tesam samaksam yusmakam diptistadrj  prakasatam
ahar  vyavastham bhavisyat vac yanca loptum agatavan ittham ma anubhavat a te dve loptum na agatavan kintu saphale karttum agatosmi
aparam yusman ahar  tat hi am vadami yavat  vyomamedinyo rdhvamso na bhavisyat i tavat  sarvu asmin saphale na jate vyavasthayah  eka matra binduh ekopi va na lopsyat e
tasmai t  yo jana eta asam ajnanam ati ksudram ekajnam api lamghate manujamnca tat ha eva siksayat i sa svargiya rajye sarvvebhi ah ksudra tvena vikhyasyat e kintu yo janah tam palayat i tat ha eva siksayat i ca sa svargiya rajye pradhana tvena vikhyasyat e
aparam yusman ahar  vadami adhyapa kaphi rusi manavanam dharmma anusthanat  yusmakam dharmma anusthane nottame jate yuyam isvariya rajyam pravestum na saksyat ha
aparanca tvam naram ma vadhih yasmai t  yo naram hanti sa vica arasabhayam danda arho bhavisyat i purvva kalin ajanebhi a iti kathitam asit   yusma abhih asravi
kintvahar  yusman vadami yah kascid   karanam vina nija bhratre kupyat i sa vica arasabhayam danda arho bhavisyat i yah kascid ca sviya sahajam nirbbodham vadati sa maha sabhayam danda arho bhavisyat i punar ca tvam mudha iti vac yam yat i kascid   sviya bhrataram vakti tarhi naraka agnau sa danda arho bhavisyat i
ato vedyah samipam nija naivedye samanitepi nija bhrataram prati kasmai ccit  karanat  tvam yat i dosi vidyase tat anim tava tasya smrti rjayat e ca
tarhi tasyah h  vedyah samipe nijana evaidyam nidhaya tat aiva gatva purvvam tena sarddham mila pasca at  agatya nija naivedyam nivedaya
anyanca yavat  viva adina sarddham vartmani tisthasi tavat  tena sarddham melanam kuru no cet viva adi vica arayituh samipe tvam samarpayat   i vica arayita ca raksinah sannidhau samarpayat   i tat a tvam karayah m badhyethah
tarhi tvamahar  tat htham bravimi sesaka pardakepi na parisodhite tasmai t  sthanat  kadapi bahis agantum na saksyasi
aparam tvam ma vyabhicara yat etat   vacanam purvvakalinalokebhi ah h kathitam asit   tat  yuyam srutavantar
kintvahar  yusman vadami yat i kascid   kamad as  kancana yositam pasyat i tarhi sa manasa tat aiva vyabhicaritavan
tasmai t  tava daksinam netram yat i tvam badhate tarhi tat netram utpatya dure niksipa yasmai t  tava sarvu avapuso narake niksepat  tava eka angasya na aso varam
yat va tava daksinah karo yat i tvam badhate tarhi tam karam chittva dure niksipa yat ah sarvu avapuso narake niksepat  eka angasya na aso varam
uktam aste yat i kascid  nija jayam parityakttum icchati tarhi sa tasyai tyaga patram dadat u
kintvahar  yusman vyaharami vyabhica aradose na jate yat i kascid  nija jayam parityajati tarhi sa tam vyabhica arayat i yah ca tam tyaktam striyam vivahati sopi vyabhicarati
punar ca tvam mrsa sapatham na kurvvan ih caraya nija sapatham palaya purvvakalinalokebhi o ya esa katha a kathita tam api yuyam srutavantar
kintvahar  yusman vadami kam api sapatham ma karsta arthatas  svarga namna na yat ah sa isvarasya simhasanam
prthivya namna api na yat ah sa tasya pada pitham yirusalamo namna api na yat ah sa maha rajasya puri
nija sironamna api na yasmai t  tasya ekam kacam api sitam asitam va karttum tvaya na sakyat e
aparam yuyam sa mlapa samaye kevalam bhavat i iti na bhavat i iti ca vadata yat a itodhik am yat  tat  papa atmano jayat e
aparam locanasya vinimayena locanam dantasya vinimayena dantar  purvvaktam idam vacananca yusma abhih asruyat a
kintvahar  yusman vadami yuyam himsakam naram ma vyaghatayat a kintu kenacid    tava daksina kapole capeta ghate krte tam prati vamam kapolanca vyaghotaya
aparam kenacid    tvaya sardhdam viva adam krtva tava paridheya vasane jighrtite tasmai yuttariyavasanamapi dehi
yat i kascid   tvam krosamekam nayat artham anyayat o dharati tat a tena sardhdam krosa dvayam yahi
yah ca manavah tvam yacate tasmai dehi yat i kascid   tubhi am dharayitum icchati tarhi tam prati parammukho ma bhuh
nija samipa vasini prema kuru kintu satrum prati dvesam kuru yat etat   puroktam vacanam etat  api yuyam srutavantar
kintvahar  yusman vadami yuyam ripu vvapi prema kuruta ye ca yusman sapante tana asisam vadata ye ca yusman rrtiyat te tesam mangalam kuruta ye ca yusman nindanti tadayat ti ca tesam krte prarthayat  hvam
tat ra yah sat amasat ancopari prabhakaram udayayat i tat ha dharmmika namadharmmika nanco pari niram varsayat i tadrso yo yusmakam svarga sthah pita yuyam tasya eva santana bhavisyat ha
ye yusmasu prema kurvvanti yuyam yat i kevalam tevu eva prema kurutha tarhi yusmakam kim phalam bhavisyat i candala api tadr sam kim na kurvvanti
aparam yuyam yat i kevalam sviya bhratr tvena namad a tarhi kim mahat  karmma kurutha candala api tadr sam kim na kurvvanti
tasmai t  yusmakam svarga sthah pita yat ha purno bhavat i yuyam api tadrsa bhavat a
savadhana bhavat a manujan darsayitum tesam gocare dharmma karmma ma kuruta tat ha krte yusmakam svarga sthapituh sakasat  kincana phalam na prapsyat ha
tvam yat a dadasi tat a kapatino jana yat ha manujebhi ah prasamsam praptum bhajana bhavane rajamarge ca turim vadayat ti tat ha ma kuriu ahar  tubhi am yat hartham kathayami te sva kayam phalam alabhanta
kintu tvam yat a dadasi tat a nija daksina karo yat  karoti tat  vama karam ma jnapaya
tena tava danam guptam bhavisyat i yah tu tava pita guptat arsi sa prakasya tubhi am phalam dasyat i
aparam yat a prarthayase tat a kapatina eva ma kuru yasmai t  te bhajana bhavane rajamargasya kone tisthanto lokan darsayat tar  prarthayitum priyat te ahar  yusman tat hi am vadami te svakiya phalam prapnuvan
tasmai t  prarthana kale antaragaram pravisya dvaram rudvva guptam pasyat astava pituh samipe prarthayasva tena tava yah pita guptat arsi sa prakasya tubhi am phalam dasyat il
aparam prarthana kale deva pujaka iva mudha punaruktim ma kuru yasmai t  te bodhante bahu varam katha ayam kathitayam tesam prarthana grahisyat e
yuyam tesam iva ma kuruta yasmai t  yusmakam yat  yat  prayojanam yacana atah prak  eva yusmakam pita tat  jana ati
ataeva yuyama idrj  prarthayat  hvam he asmai kam svargasthapitas  tava nama pujyam bhavat u
tava raja tvam bhavat u taveccha svarge yat ha tat ha eva medinyam api saphala bhavat u
asmai kam prayojaniyam aharam adya dehi
vayam yat ha nija aparadhinah ksamam ahe tat haiva asmakam aparadhan ksamasva
asmai n pariksam manaya kintu papa atmano raksa raja tvam gauravam parakramah ete sarvve sarvvada tava tat hastu
yat i yuyam anyesam aparadhan ksamadhve tarhi yusmakam svargasthapita api yusman ksamisyat e
kintu yat i yuyam anyesam aparadhan na ksamadhve tarhi yusmakam jana kopi yusmakam aparadhan na ksamisyat e
aparam upavasa kale kapatino jana ma anusan upavasam jnapayitum svesam vadanani mlanani kurvvanti yuyam ta eva visana vadana ma bhavat a ahar  yusman tat hi am vadami te svakiya phalam alabhanta
yat a tvam upavasasi tat a yat ha lokaih tvam upavasi iva na drsyase kintu tava yogocarah pita tena eva drsyase tat krte nija sirasi tailam marddaya vadananca praksalaya
tena tava yah pita guptat arsi sa prakasya tubhi am phalam dasyat i
aparam yat ra sthane kitah kalankah ca ksayam nayat ti caurah ca sandhim karttayitva corayitum saknuvanti tadrsyam medinyam sva artham dhanam ma samcinuta
kintu yat ra sthane kitah kalankah ca ksayam na nayat ti caurah ca sandhim karttayitva corayitum na saknuvanti tadrse svarge dhanam sancinuta
yasmai t  yat ra sthane yusmamka dhanam tat raiva khane yusmakam manamsi
locanam dehasya pradipakam tasmai t  yat i tava locanam prasannam bhavat i tarhi tava krtsnam vapu rdipti yuktam bhavisyat i
kintu locane prasanne tava krtsnam vapuh tamisra yuktam bhavisyat i ataeva ya diptih tvayi vidyat e sa yat i tamisra yukta bhavat i tarhi tat  tamisram kiyat  mahat
kopi manujo dvau prabhu sevitum na saknoti yasmai d ekam sammanya tat anyam na sammanyat  e yat va ekatra mano nidhaya tat anyam avamanyat  e tat ha yuyam api isvaram laksminceti ubhe sevitum na saknutha
aparam ahar  yusmabhi am tat hi am kathayami kim bhaksisyamah kim pasyamah iti prana dharanaya ma cintayat a kim paridhasyamah iti kaya raksanaya na cintayat a bhaksyat  prana vasananca vapumsi kim sresthani na hi

somasya rajno varunasya dharmani barhaspateranumad ya usarmani
tava aham adya maghavan upastutau dhatar vidhatah kalasanabhaksayama
para suto bhaksa makaram carau api sat omam cemam parathamahsuriruna marje
sute satena yat yagamam vam parativisvamitra jamadagni dame
vatasya nu mahimanam rathasya rujan eti sat at ayat nasyaghosah
divisprga yati arunani karnu annuto eti parthivyarenumasyat a
sam parerate anu vatasya vistha ainam gachanti samanam na yosah
tabhih sayuka sa ratham deva iyat easya visvasya bhuvanasya raja
antarikse pathibhih iyamano na ni visate katamaccana ahah
apam sakha paratham aja ratava kava sa vid jatah kuta ababhuva
atma devanam bhuvanasya garbho yat havasam carati devesah
ghosa idasya sarnvih e na rupam tasmai vatayahavisa vidhema
mayo bhuh vato abhi vatusra urjasu atirosa dhirari santama
pivasvatih jiva dhanyah pibantu avasaya padvaterudra marla
yah sarupa virupa eka rupa yasam agnih istya namani veda
ya anagirasah tapasi iha cakrustabhi ahparjanya mahi sarma yat ha
ya devesu tat vamairayat ta yasam somo visva rupani veda
ta asmabhi am payasa pinvamanah para javatirindragosthe ririhi
para japatirmahi ameta rarano visvaih devaih pitrbhih samvidanah
siva ah sat irupa no gosthamakah tasamvayam para jaya sam sat ema
vibhrada barhata pibatu somyam madhu ayuh dadhada yajnapatau avihrutama
vata juto yo abhiraksati tamana para jah puposa purudha vi rajati
vibhrada barhata subhrtam vajasatamam dharmana divo dharunesat yam arpitama
amitra ha vartra ha dasyuhantamam jayotih jajnesuraha sapatna ha
idam sarestham jayotisam jayotih uttamam visvajiddhanajiducyat e barhata
visvabhrada bharajo mahi suryo darsa auh u paprathe saha ojo acyutam a
vibhrajana jayotisa sa varagacho rocanam divah
yenem avisva bhuvana anyabhrta visvakarmana visvadevyavat a
tavam tayamitato ratham indra paravah sutavat as
asrnoh somino havama
tavam makhasya dodhatas  siroava tavaco bharah
agachah somino garham a
